title: Remove admin/config UI, remove landing images, and hardcode Google Drive APK link

requirements.summary: Remove the in-UI Admin Panel so end users cannot access any configuration UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The AdminPanel component is not rendered anywhere in the app UI (including on the LandingPage).
No floating panel / config editor appears on any viewport size.
Any routes/entry points that previously showed the admin panel no longer do so.

file_operations.description: Remove the AdminPanel import and JSX render so no admin/config UI is mounted anywhere in the app.
Remove the AdminPanel implementation so it cannot be reintroduced via import/render from elsewhere.

requirements.summary: Hardcode all APK download actions to a single fixed Google Drive URL and remove runtime/localStorage-configured download behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the primary CTA in the Hero section triggers a download/navigation using the exact Google Drive URL provided.
Clicking the primary CTA in the Final CTA section triggers a download/navigation using the exact Google Drive URL provided.
There are no remaining code paths that read the APK download URL from localStorage or an admin-edited config at runtime.

file_operations.description: Replace LANDING_CONFIG-based download logic with a fixed exported constant using the exact Google Drive URL (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hFHZKQIsXB-80s6kiqhzfsKxi3s24qA7/view?usp=drive_link) and a single helper that navigates to it (avoid localStorage/config-driven URL selection).

Remove customizable download/image configuration and any documentation-style comments implying runtime customization; define/ export the fixed Google Drive APK URL constant here (or re-export from download.ts) so the location is explicit in code.

Remove localStorage config loading and update the primary CTA to use the shared fixed-link helper (from frontend/src/components/landing/download.ts) so it always navigates to the exact Google Drive URL.

Remove localStorage config loading and update the CTA button to use the shared fixed-link helper (from frontend/src/components/landing/download.ts) so it always navigates to the exact Google Drive URL.
Remove the mockups component to eliminate any remaining mockup image configuration and any localStorage-based image paths.
Remove localStorage-based image override logic and remove any remaining image-driven configuration usage so no runtime config (localStorage/admin) affects the landing page.

requirements.summary: Remove all images and mockups from the landing page while keeping the ultra-minimal black aesthetic.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section does not render any floating mockup/phone images.
The Psychological Hit section does not render any revealed UI image/screenshot.
The What It Does section does not render any images for its blocks.
No elements (or CSS background images) are used for product mockups/screenshots anywhere on the landing page.

file_operations.description: Remove the FloatingMockups render (and associated layout spacing if needed) so the Hero renders with typography-only content and no image/mockup elements.
Remove the UI reveal block that renders an and any state/logic solely used to reveal images; keep the typography/animation experience intact without images.
Remove the three blocks and adjust layout so each feature block is text-only (title/description) while preserving the minimal black aesthetic.
Remove or stop using image fields from landing copy for feature blocks so the copy model matches the no-images landing page behavior.
Verify the composed landing sections no longer include any image-based components and that the page renders without elements or CSS background images tied to mockups/screenshots.

requirements.summary: Update customization documentation and configuration modules to reflect fixed-link and no-images behavior (English, with exact Google Drive URL).
acceptanceCriteria: Documentation no longer instructs users to use the Admin Panel to edit links/images.
Documentation no longer instructs users to add/replace landing page images for mockups/showcase blocks.
Documentation clearly states the APK download link is fixed to the provided Google Drive URL and indicates where it is defined in code.

file_operations.description: Rewrite the guide in English to remove Admin Panel/localStorage/image replacement instructions; document that the APK link is fixed to https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hFHZKQIsXB-80s6kiqhzfsKxi3s24qA7/view?usp=drive_link and point to where it is defined (e.g., frontend/src/components/landing/download.ts and/or frontend/src/components/landing/landingConfig.ts).
Update module comments/structure to reflect fixed-link, no-images behavior (remove references to replacing images, mockups, and localStorage-based editing).
